name: Fallen King
description:
Hello ! I present you my first  project on Unity for start mastering Unity and learn C# 

So this is Fallen King !  You're a King who want to recover his throne and for that you need to travel differents places of your country.  

Controls : 

- Movement :  Kayboard Arrow Left and Right 

- Jump : Space 

- Pause : Esc 

A specially thanks for TUTO UNITY FR who help me so much : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJRwb5W4ZzG43J5_dViL6Fw

TilesSheet and Tilemap use : https://opengameart.org/content/a-platformer-in-the-forest 

Music use : https://opengameart.org/content/hero-immortal / https://opengameart.org/content/8bit-style-music

SoundDesign : https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effects-library
